text: John Harris was a Northern Irish amateur football left half who played in the Irish League for Cliftonville and Glenavon. He represented Ireland internationally at football and played minor matches for the Ireland cricket team. ==References== Category:Association footballers from Northern Ireland Category:NIFL Premiership players Category:Association football wing halves Category:Year of birth missing Category:Place of birth missing Category:Cliftonville F.C. players Category:Northern Ireland amateur international footballers Category:Glenavon F.C. players Category:Pre-1950 IFA international footballers Category:Irish League representative players
title: John Harris (Irish footballer)
